attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. The Crv has long been known for its accommodating and versatile Interior. The 5th generation CR-V builds on that legacy with an even more spacious and space-efficient interior – in fact, this is the roomiest CR-V cabin yet! with 50 liters for passenger volume. Top of class interior space and best-in-class rear seat legroom, 53mm
more than the previous model. The seats are an all-new design for the 5th generation CR-V and they are amazingly comfortable. New up styled Honda 19'' alloys, Also prominent is the 7-inch Display Audio interface that offers easier access to the vehicle’s infotainment features. The system offers enhanced functionality, including Apple CarPlay integration, which allows seamless integration of iPhone features and functions, such as the device's own GPS navigation, voice-controlled search capability and selected apps.ROAD DEPARTURE
MITIGATION (RDM) SYSTEM, LaneWatch, Lane Departure Warning System &
Lane Keeping Assist System (LKAS),COLLISION MITIGATION
BRAKING SYSTEM™ (CMBS),Adaptive Cruise Control (ACC),FORWARD COLLISION WARNING SYSTEM. 5 Year/90 000km Service plan, Maintenance plan Opt, 5 year/200 000km warranty- can be extended.
